item.title: [COLOR yellow] _**_ [/COLOR][COLOR white] Deportes a la carta[/COLOR][COLOR lime][I] Addon Necesario[/I][/COLOR][COLOR yellow]_**_ [/COLOR]
[COLOR yellow] _**_ [/COLOR][COLOR white] Avezy [COLOR lime] (Addon Avezy Necesario)[/COLOR][COLOR yellow] _**_ [/COLOR]

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un Liga ', ['LA LIGA', 'LA LIGA 2', 'PREMIER LEAGUE', 'UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE', 'COPA DE ESPAÑA', 'BUNDESLIGA', 'FRANCE LIGUE 1', 'PORTUGAL A LIGA', 'EFL CUP', 'COPA LIBERTADORES', 'COPA SUDAMERICANA', 'USA MLS', 'COLOMBIA PRIMERA', 'MEXICO LIGA MX', 'MEXICO COPA MX', 'CHILE LEAGUE', 'ARGENTINA SUPERLIGA']) lists = ['SPANISH LA LIGA', 'SPANISH LA LIGA 2', 'PREMIER LEAGUE', 'UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE', 'SPANISH CUP', 'BUNDESLIGA', 'FRANCE LIGUE 1', 'PORTUGAL A LIGA', 'EFL CUP', 'COPA LIBERTADORES', 'COPA SUDAMERICANA', 'USA MLS', 'COLOMBIA PRIMERA', 'MEXICO LIGA MX', 'MEXICO COPA MX', 'CHILE LEAGUE', 'ARGENTINA SUPERLIGA'] return lists[ret]

iem.title: [COLOR white][B] Agenda Arenavision [COLOR white] Server [COLOR white][in][/COLOR] [Horarios] [/COLOR][/B][/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <item><title> [COLOR lightgreen][makelist.param1] [/COLOR] [COLOR white][makelist.param2] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightslategray][makelist.param3] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightblue][makelist.param4] [/COLOR] [COLOR white][B][makelist.param5] [/B] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightslategray]Canal [makelist.param6] - [makelist.param7] [/COLOR] </title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=$doregex[hash]&mode=1&name=BlackAddon+[makelist.param5]+Arenavision</link> <regex> <name>hash</name> <expres>this.loadPlayer\("(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://www.arenavision.in/[makelist.param6]</page> <referer>http://www.arenavision.in</referer> <setcookie>beget=begetok</setcookie> </regex> <thumbnail>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blackghostaddon/gray/master/img/acestreams.png</thumbnail> </item>
